Sentencas: In the present work the basic transport processes occurring in a planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) were simulated.

Sentencas: The Navier-Stokes and energy equations, including convective and diffusive terms, were numerically solved by the commercial CFD-ACE(+).
